translation.en: very much surprised
translation.tok: ona li pilin pi sin nasa

translation.en: what sort of me
translation.tok: ‘mi’ seme

translation.en: pooh bear
translation.tok: soweli pi luka wawa pu

translation.en: are you sure said rabbit
translation.tok: sina pilin sona anu seme li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: still more surprised
translation.tok: ona li pilin pi sin pi nasa mute

translation.en: quite quite sure said pooh
translation.tok: mi pilin sona a a li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: oh well then come in
translation.tok: a ni la o kama lon insa

translation.en: so pooh pushed and pushed and pushed his way through the hole and at last he got in
translation.tok: ni la soweli pu li tawa kepeken noka en luka lon lupa nasin li kama lon insa lon pini pi tenpo suli

translation.en: you were quite right said rabbit
translation.tok: sina toki pona a li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: looking at him all over
translation.tok: ona li lukin e ale ona

translation.en: it is you
translation.tok: ni la sina

translation.en: glad to see you
translation.tok: mi pilin pona tan ni

translation.en: who did you think it was
translation.tok: tawa sina la ni la jan seme

translation.en: well i wasn’t sure
translation.tok: mi pilin sona ala

translation.en: you know how it is in the forest
translation.tok: sina sona a e insa pi ma pi kasi suli

translation.en: one can’t have anybody coming into one’s house
translation.tok: jan li ken ala tawa insa tomo e jan mu

translation.en: one has to be careful
what about a mouthful of something
translation.tok: moku li pona anu seme

translation.en: pooh always liked a little something at eleven o’clock in the morning
translation.tok: tenpo ale la tawa soweli pu la moku lili lon pini pi kama pi tenpo suno li pona

translation.en: and he was very glad to see rabbit getting out the plates and mugs and when rabbit said honey or condensed milk with your bread
translation.tok: ona li pilin pi pona mute tan ni soweli pi kute suli li lon supa e poki li toki e ni ko suwi anu ko pi telo mama lon poka pi pan sina

translation.en: he was so excited that he said both
translation.tok: ona li pilin pi nasa wawa ni ona li toki sin e ni tu ale

translation.en: and then so as not to seem greedy he added but don’t bother about the bread please
translation.tok: ona li wile e ni ala ona li wile ike tan ni la ona li toki sin e ni sina ken awen weka e pan

translation.en: and for a long time after that he said nothing…
translation.tok: pini ni la tenpo suli la ona li toki ala…

translation.en: until at last humming to himself in a rather sticky voice he got up shook rabbit lovingly by the paw and said that he must be going on
translation.tok: pini ona la ona li kalama musi kepeken uta pi open ala tawa ona sama kepeken kalama uta ko a li kama sinpin li luka e luka pi soweli pi kute suli kepeken pilin li toki e ni ona li wile tawa

translation.en: must you said rabbit politely
translation.tok: sina wile anu seme li toki suwi pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: well said pooh i could stay a little longer if itif you
translation.tok: a  li toki pi soweli pu  mi ken awen lon tenpo sin lon ni…

translation.en: and he tried very hard to look in the direction of the larder
translation.tok: ona li lukin lukin tawa tomo pi poki moku

translation.en: as a matter of fact said rabbit i was going out myself directly
translation.tok: ni li lon  li toki pi soweli pi kute suli  mi sama li tawa weka

translation.en: oh well then i’ll be going on
translation.tok: a ni la mi tawa

translation.en: goodbye
translation.tok: mi tawa

translation.en: well goodbye if you’re sure you won’t have any more
translation.tok: a tawa pona lon ni sina pilin sona e ni sina wile ala e ijo sin

translation.en: is there any more asked pooh quickly
translation.tok: ijo sin li lon anu seme li toki pi soweli pu lon tenpo lili

translation.en: rabbit took the covers off the dishes and said no there wasn’t
translation.tok: soweli pi kute suli li weka e len tan poki moku li toki e ni ala lon ala

translation.en: i thought not said pooh
translation.tok: sama ni la tawa mi la ala li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: nodding to himself
translation.tok: ona li a kepeken lawa tawa ona sama

translation.en: well goodbye
translation.tok: a mi tawa

translation.en: i must be going on
translation.tok: mi wile tawa

translation.en: so he started to climb out of the hole
translation.tok: ni la ona li kama tawa kepeken noka en luka tawa weka tan lupa

translation.en: he pulled with his front paws and pushed with his back paws
translation.tok: ona li lukin tan e ona sama kepeken luka li lukin tawa e ona kepeken noka

translation.en: and in a little while his nose was out in the open again…
translation.tok: pini pi tenpo lili la nena sinpin li kama…

translation.en: and then his ears…
translation.tok: kute li kama…

translation.en: and then his front paws…
translation.tok: luka li kama…

translation.en: and then his shoulders…
translation.tok: lawa sinpin li kama

translation.en: and then
translation.tok: ni la

translation.en: oh help said pooh
translation.tok: o pana e pona li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: i’d better go back
translation.tok: mi wile tawa monsi

translation.en: oh bother said pooh
translation.tok: a ike li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: i shall have to go on
translation.tok: mi wile tawa sinpin

translation.en: i can’t do either said pooh
translation.tok: tu ale li ken ala li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: oh help and bother
translation.tok: o pana e pona a ike

translation.en: now by this time rabbit wanted to go for a walk too
translation.tok: tenpo ni la sama ni la soweli pi kute suli li wile tawa weka

translation.en: and finding the front door full
translation.tok: taso ona li jo e lupa pi open ala

translation.en: he went out by the back door and came round to pooh and looked at him
translation.tok: tan ni la ona li tawa weka kepeken lupa pi monsi tomo li tawa lon poka sike tomo tawa soweli pu li lukin e ona

translation.en: hallo are you stuck he asked
translation.tok: toki sina lon insa ike anu seme li toki ona

translation.en: nno said pooh carelessly
translation.tok: aala li toki pi soweli pu kepeken pilin ala

translation.en: just resting
translation.tok: mi lape taso

translation.en: and thinking
translation.tok: mi toki insa taso

translation.en: and humming to myself
translation.tok: mi kalama musi taso kepeken uta pi open ala tawa mi sama

translation.en: here give us a paw
translation.tok: o o pana e luka

translation.en: pooh bear stretched out a paw
translation.tok: soweli pi luka wawa pu li lukin tawa weka e luka

translation.en: and rabbit pulled and pulled and pulled…
translation.tok: soweli pi kute suli li lukin tan e ona li lukin tan e ona li lukin tan e ona…

translation.en: ow cried pooh
translation.tok: a li toki wawa pi soweli pu

translation.en: you’re hurting
translation.tok: sina pana e pilin ike

translation.en: the fact is said rabbit
translation.tok: ni li lon li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: you’re stuck
translation.tok: sina lon insa ike

translation.en: it all comes said pooh crossly of not having front doors big enough
translation.tok: ale ni li kama  li toki pi soweli pu kepeken pilin utala  tan ni jan li jo ala e lupa pi sinpin tomo pi suli pona

translation.en: it all comes said rabbit sternly of eating too much
translation.tok: ale ni li kama  li toki kiwen pi soweli pi kute suli  tan ni jan li moku ike

translation.en: i thought at the time said rabbit only i didn’t like to say anything said rabbit that one of us was eating too much said rabbit
translation.tok: tenpo la mi toki insa taso mi wile ala toki kalama e ni  li toki pi soweli pi kute suli  wan pi mi tu li moku ike li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: and i knew if wasn’t me he said
translation.tok: mi sona e ni mi pali ala li toki ona

translation.en: well well i shall go and fetch christopher robin
translation.tok: ni ni mi tawa ni e jan kitopa jopin

translation.en: christopher robin lived at the other end of the forest
translation.tok: tomo pi jan kitopa jopin li lon poka ante pi ma pi kasi suli

translation.en: and when he came back with rabbit and saw the front half of pooh he said silly old bear in such a loving voice that everybody felt quite hopeful again
translation.tok: ona li tawa sin lon poka pi soweli pi kute suli li lukin e wan tu sinpin pi soweli pu la ona li toki e ni soweli nasa pi luka wawa o kepeken kalama uta pi suwi ni jan ale li pilin sin pi kama pona

translation.en: i was just beginning to think said bear sniffing slightly that rabbit might never be able to use his front door again
translation.tok: mi kama toki insa e ni  li toki pi soweli pi luka wawa kepeken kalama uta pi pilin ike  soweli pi kute suli li ken kepeken lupa tomo ona lon tenpo kama ala

translation.en: and i should hate that he said
translation.tok: ni li ike tawa mi

translation.en: so should i said rabbit
translation.tok: tawa mi a li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: use his front door again said christopher robin
translation.tok: kepeken e lupa tomo ona li toki pi jan kitopa jopin

translation.en: of course he’ll use his front door again
translation.tok: ni li sona ona li kepeken lupa tomo ona lon tenpo sin

translation.en: good said rabbit
translation.tok: pona li toki pi soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: if we can’t pull you out pooh we might push you back
translation.tok: mi mute li ken ala tan e sina tawa weka soweli pu o ken la mi mute li wile tawa e sina tawa monsi

translation.en: rabbit scratched his whiskers thoughtfully and pointed out that when once pooh was pushed back he was back
translation.tok: jan soweli pi kute suli li toki insa li luka kiwen e linja uta li toki e ni jan li tawa monsi e soweli pu la ona li lon ni lon tenpo sin

translation.en: and of course nobody was more glad to see pooh than he was
translation.tok: sona li ni ona li pilin pi pona mute tan ni ona li lon poka pi soweli pu

translation.en: still there it was some lived in trees and some lived underground and
translation.tok: taso jan wan li jo e tomo lon kasi suli jan ante li jo e tomo lon anpa ma…

translation.en: you mean i’d never get out said pooh
translation.tok: sina toki e ni anu seme tenpo ala la mi ken tawa weka li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: i mean said rabbit that having got so far it seems a pity to waste it
translation.tok: mi toki e ni mute li kama tawa mi la ona li kama weka ike la ni li pana e pilin ike

translation.en: christopher robin nodded
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin li a kepeken lawa

translation.en: then there’s only one thing to be done he said
translation.tok: ni la ken li wan taso li toki ona

translation.en: we shall have to wait for you to get thin again
translation.tok: mi mute o awen lon tenpo ni sina kama suli ala lon tenpo sin

translation.en: how long does getting thin take asked pooh anxiously
translation.tok: tenpo ni jan li kama suli ala li suli anu seme li toki pi soweli pu pi pilin akesi

translation.en: about a week i should think
translation.tok: tawa mi la ni li sama tenpo suno esun

translation.en: but i can’t stay here for a week
translation.tok: taso mi ken ala awen lon ni lon ale pi tenpo suno esun

translation.en: you can stay here all right silly old bear
translation.tok: sina ken a awen lon ni soweli nasa pi luka wawa o

translation.en: it’s getting you out which is so difficult
translation.tok: ni taso li ike pali sina li kama tan

translation.en: we’ll read to you said rabbit cheerfully
translation.tok: mi mute li ken lukin e sitelen tawa sina li toki pi soweli pi kute suli kepeken pilin pona

translation.en: and i hope it won’t snow he added
translation.tok: kama pi ken ni taso li pona tawa mi telo ko kiwen li kama anpa ala li toki sin ona

translation.en: and i say old fellow you’re taking up a good deal of room in my house
translation.tok: mi toki e ni jan pona o sina lon insa mute pi tomo mi

translation.en: do you mind if i use your back legs as a towelhorse because i mean there they aredoing nothingand it would be very convenient just to hang the towels on them
translation.tok: ni li pona tawa sina anu seme mi kepeken e noka sina sama ilo kili tan ni tawa mi la ona li pali ala jan li ken kili e len lon supa ona la ni li pana e pona pali

translation.en: a week said pooh gloomily
translation.tok: tenpo suno esun a li toki pi soweli pu pi pilin ike

translation.en: what about meals
translation.tok: ijo moku li seme

translation.en: i’m afraid no meals said christopher robin
translation.tok: mi pilin ike tan ni moku li lon ala li toki pi jan kitopa jopin

translation.en: because of getting thin quicker
translation.tok: ni pona pali e ni sina ken kama sin suli ala

translation.en: but we will read to you
translation.tok: taso mi mute li ken lukin e sitelen tawa sina

translation.en: bear began to sigh and then found he couldn’t because he was so tightly stuck
translation.tok: soweli pi luka wawa li kama a pi pilin ike li kama lukin e ni ona li ken ala tan ni ona li lon insa pi lili ike ni

translation.en: and a tear rolled down his eye
translation.tok: wan telo li kama anpa tan lukin ona

translation.en: as he said
translation.tok: ona li toki e ni

translation.en: then would you read a sustaining book such as would help and comfort a wedged bear in great tightness
translation.tok: ni la sina ken lukin e sitelen pi lipu ona li pana e wawa anu seme li pana e pona e pilin pona tawa soweli pi luka wawa lon insa ike

translation.en: so for a week christopher robin read that sort of book at the north end of pooh and rabbit hung his washing on the south end … and in between bear felt himself getting slenderer and slenderer
translation.tok: ni la ale pi tenpo suno esun la jan kitopa jopin li lukin e sitelen pi lipu ni lon poka pi suno ala soweli pi kute suli li kili e len telo lon poka suno

translation.en: and at the end of the week christopher robin said now
translation.tok: pini pi tenpo suno esun la jan kitopa jopin li toki e ni o

translation.en: so he took hold of pooh’s front paws
translation.tok: ni la ona li kama awen e luka pi soweli pu

translation.en: and rabbit took hold of christopher robin
translation.tok: sin ni la soweli pi kute suli li kama awen e jan kitopa jopin

translation.en: and all rabbit’s friends and relations took hold of rabbit
translation.tok: sin la jan pona ale pi soweli pi kute suli en jan sama li kama awen e soweli pi kute suli

translation.en: and they all pulled together…
translation.tok: jan ale li lukin tan e soweli pu…

translation.en: and for a long time pooh only said ow …
translation.tok: tenpo suli la soweli pu li toki e ni taso ike …

translation.en: and oh …
translation.tok: e ni o …

translation.en: and then all of a sudden he said pop
translation.tok: ni la lon tenpo lili la ona li toki e ni po

translation.en: just as if a cork were coming out of a bottle
translation.tok: ni li sama ilo len ona li kama tan lupa poki

translation.en: and christopher robin and rabbit and all rabbit’s friends and relations went headoverheels backwards…
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin en soweli pi kute suli en jan pona ale ona en jan sama ale ona li tawa sike tawa monsi…

translation.en: and on the top of them came winniethepoohfree
translation.tok: supa ona la soweli wini pu li kama  taso

translation.en: so with a nod of thanks to his friends he went on with his walk through the forest humming proudly to himself
translation.tok: ni la ona li a kepeken lawa tawa jan pona mute li awen sin tawa lon ma pi kasi suli li kalama musi kepeken uta pi open ala tawa ona sama

translation.en: but christopher robin looked after him lovingly and said to himself silly old bear
translation.tok: taso jan kitopa jopin li lukin e monsi tawa ona kepeken pilin olin li toki tawa ona sama e ni soweli nasa pi luka wawa o

translation.en: chapter iii
translation.tok: wan lipu pa mute

translation.en: in which pooh and piglet go hunting and nearly catch a woozle
translation.tok: ona la soweli pu en soweli lili li alasa li alasa pi lili ike e soweli pi kiwen uta wawa

translation.en: the piglet lived in a very grand house in the middle of a beechtree
translation.tok: soweli lili li jo e tomo pi suli mute lon insa pi kasi suli

translation.en: and the beechtree was in the middle of the forest
translation.tok: kasi suli ni li lon insa pi ma pi kasi suli

translation.en: and the piglet lived in the middle of the house
translation.tok: soweli lili li jo e tomo lon insa pi tomo ni

translation.en: next to his house was a piece of broken board which had
translation.tok: poka pi tomo ona la lipu suli li lon

translation.en: trespassers w on it
translation.tok: ona li jo e sitelen jan pi tawa akesi w

translation.en: when christopher robin asked the piglet what it meant he said it was his grandfather’s name and had been in the family for a long time
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin li wile sona tan soweli lili e kon ona la ona li toki e ni ni li nimi pi mama mama li ijo pi kulupu mama tan kama pi tenpo suli

translation.en: christopher robin said you couldn’t be called trespassers w
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin li toki e ni jan li ken ala jo e nimi jan pi tawa akesi w

translation.en: and piglet said yes you could because his grandfather was
translation.tok: soweli lili li toki e ni jan li ken jo tan ni mama mama ona li jo

translation.en: and it was short for trespassers will
translation.tok: ale pi nimi ni li jan pi tawa akesi wi

translation.en: which was short for trespassers william
translation.tok: ale pi nimi ni li ni jan pi tawa akesi wilijen

translation.en: and his grandfather had had two names in case he lost onetrespassers after an uncle and william after trespassers
translation.tok: mama mama ona li jo e nimi tu tan ken pi ike kama ni ona li pini jo e wan ona jan pi tawa ike lon pini pi mama sama wilijen lon pini pi jan pi tawa ike

translation.en: i’ve got two names said christopher robin carelessly
translation.tok: mi jo e nimi tu li toki pi jan kitopa jopin kepeken pilin ala

translation.en: well there you are that proves it said piglet
translation.tok: ni ni li pana e pilin sona li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: one fine winter’s day when piglet was brushing away the snow in front of his house he happened to look up
translation.tok: tenpo suno pi tenpo lete pi pona lukin la soweli pi palisa monsi sike li weka e ko lete tan sinpin pi lupa tomo ona la tan ken la ona li lukin e sewi

translation.en: and there was winniethepooh
translation.tok: ni la soweli wini pu li lon

translation.en: pooh was walking round and round in a circle thinking of something else
translation.tok: soweli pu li tawa lon poka sike li tawa lon poka sike li toki insa e ijo pi ijo ante

translation.en: and when piglet called to him he just went on walking
translation.tok: soweli pi palisa monsi sike li toki wawa tawa ona la ona li awen tawa a

translation.en: hallo said piglet
translation.tok: toki li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: what are you doing
translation.tok: sina pali seme

translation.en: hunting said pooh
translation.tok: mi alasa li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: hunting what
translation.tok: sina alasa e seme li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: tracking something said winniethepooh very mysteriously
translation.tok: mi lukin e sitelen noka ijo li toki pi soweli wini pu tan weka sona nasa

translation.en: tracking what said piglet
translation.tok: sina lukin e sitelen noka seme li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: coming closer
translation.tok: ona li tawa poka

translation.en: that’s just what i ask myself
translation.tok: mi toki e ni a tawa mi

translation.en: i ask myself what
translation.tok: mi toki e ni tawa mi seme

translation.en: what do you think you’ll answer
translation.tok: tawa sina la sina toki sin e seme

translation.en: i shall have to wait
translation.tok: mi wile awen

translation.en: until i catch up with it said winniethepooh
translation.tok: mi pini kama e ni mi alasa e ona li toki pi soweli wini pu

translation.en: now look there
translation.tok: o lukin e ni

translation.en: he pointed to the ground in front of him
translation.tok: ona li palisa e anpa lon sinpin

translation.en: what do you see there
translation.tok: sina lukin e seme

translation.en: tracks said piglet pawmarks
translation.tok: sitelen noka li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: he gave a little squeak of excitement
translation.tok: ona li kalama lili kepeken uta lili tan pilin pi nasa wawa

translation.en: oh pooh
translation.tok: soweli pu o

translation.en: do you think it’s aaa woozle
translation.tok: tawa sina la ni li … ni li … ni li soweli pi kiwen uta wawa anu seme

translation.en: it may be said pooh
translation.tok: ken la ni li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: sometimes it is
translation.tok: tenpo wan la ni

translation.en: and sometimes it isn’t
translation.tok: tenpo ante la ala

translation.en: you never can tell with pawmarks
translation.tok: tenpo ala la jan li ken kama sona e ijo pi sitelen noka

translation.en: with these few words he went on tracking
translation.tok: pini pi nimi ni pi mute ala la ona li awen lukin e sitelen noka

translation.en: and piglet after watching him for a minute or two ran after him
translation.tok: soweli lili li lukin e ona lon tenpo pi mute wan li tawa wawa tawa monsi ona

translation.en: winniethepooh had come to a sudden stop and was bending over the tracks in a puzzled sort of way
translation.tok: soweli wini pu li pini tawa lon tenpo lili li kama anpa lon sewi pi sitelen noka li pilin pi weka sona nasa

translation.en: what’s the matter asked piglet
translation.tok: seme li lon li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: it’s a very funny thing said bear
translation.tok: ni li ijo nasa li toki pi soweli pi luka wawa

translation.en: but there seem to be two animals now
translation.tok: taso tawa mi la tenpo ni la soweli tu li lon

translation.en: thiswhateveritwashas been joined by anotherwhateveritis
translation.tok: soweli mu ni li kama lon poka pi soweli mu ante

translation.en: and the two of them are now proceeding in company
translation.tok: soweli tu ni li awen tawa lon poka kulupu

translation.en: would you mind coming with me piglet in case they turn out to be hostile animals
translation.tok: tawa sina la ni li pona anu seme sina tawa lon poka mi  soweli lili o  tan ken ni pi ike kama ona tu li utala

translation.en: piglet scratched his ear in a nice sort of way and said that he had nothing to do until friday and would be delighted to come in case it really was a woozle
translation.tok: soweli lili li luka kiwen e kute li suwi lukin li toki e ni ona li pali ala lon tenpo suno esun ni li wile kama tan ken ni ni li lon li soweli pi kiwen uta wawa

translation.en: you mean in case it really is two woozles said winniethepooh
translation.tok: sina wile toki e ni ni li soweli tu pi kiwen uta wawa li toki pi soweli wini pu

translation.en: and piglet said that anyhow he had nothing to do until friday
translation.tok: soweli lili li toki e ni taso ona li pali ala lon tenpo suno esun ni

translation.en: so off they went together
translation.tok: ni la ona tu li tawa lon poka kulupu

translation.en: there was a small spinney of larch trees just here
translation.tok: mute lili pi kasi suli anpa li lon ni

translation.en: and it seemed as if the two woozles if that is what they were had been going round this spinney
translation.tok: tawa lukin la soweli tu pi kiwen uta wawa  ona tu li ni la  li tawa lon poka sike pi mute ni pi kasi suli moli

translation.en: so round this spinney went pooh and piglet after them
translation.tok: sama ni la soweli pu en soweli lili pi palisa monsi sike li tawa lon poka sike pi mute ni pi kasi suli moli lon monsi pi ona tu

translation.en: piglet passing the time by telling pooh what his grandfather trespassers w had done to remove stiffness after tracking
translation.tok: soweli pi palisa monsi sike li musi li toki e ni tawa soweli pu mama mama pi tawa akesi w li pini lukin e sitelen noka la ona li wile weka e kiwen tan noka la ona li pali ona

translation.en: and how his grandfather trespassers w had suffered in his later years from shortness of breath
translation.tok: sin la ona li toki e ni sike suno pini ona la mama mama pi tawa akesi w li pilin ike tan weka kon

translation.en: and other matters of interest
translation.tok: sin la ona li toki e ijo ante pi pona sona

translation.en: and pooh wondering what a grandfather was like
translation.tok: soweli pu li pilin pi weka sona ni mama mama li seme

translation.en: and if perhaps this was two grandfathers they were after now
translation.tok: ken la ona tu li alasa e mama mama tu anu seme

translation.en: and if so whether he would be allowed to take one home and keep it
translation.tok: ni la ona li ken tawa tomo e wan ona li ken awen e ona anu seme

translation.en: and what christopher robin would say
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin li toki e seme pi ijo ni

translation.en: and still the tracks went on in front of them…
translation.tok: sin la sitelen noka li awen lon sinpin ona…

translation.en: suddenly winniethepooh stopped and pointed excitedly in front of him
translation.tok: tenpo lili la soweli wini pu li pini tawa li pilin pi nasa wawa li palisa e sinpin

translation.en: look
translation.tok: o lukin

translation.en: what said piglet with a jump
translation.tok: e seme li toki pi soweli lili li noka e anpa li tawa sewi

translation.en: and then to show that he hadn’t been frightened
translation.tok: ona li wile sama ni ona li pilin akesi ala

translation.en: he jumped up and down once or twice more
translation.tok: tan ni la ona li noka e anpa li tawa sewi lon tenpo pi wan anu tu

translation.en: in an exercising sort of way
translation.tok: kepeken ni la ona li sama pona e sijelo kepeken tawa

translation.en: the tracks said pooh
translation.tok: sitelen noka a li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: a third animal has joined the other two
translation.tok: soweli pa mute li kama lon poka pi tu ante

translation.en: pooh cried piglet
translation.tok: soweli pu o li toki wawa pi soweli lili

translation.en: do you think it is another woozle
translation.tok: tawa sina la ni li soweli pi kiwen uta wawa ante

translation.en: no said pooh
translation.tok: ala li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: because it makes different marks
translation.tok: tan ni ona li lon e sitelen ante

translation.en: it is either two woozles and one as it might be wizzle
translation.tok: ken wan la ni li soweli tu pi kiwen uta wawa en soweli lili wan pi kiwen uta wawa

translation.en: or two as it might be wizzles and one if so it is woozle
translation.tok: ken ante la ni li soweli lili tu pi kiwen uta wawa en soweli suli wan pi kiwen uta

translation.en: let us continue to follow them
translation.tok: mi o awen tawa lon monsi ona

translation.en: so they went on feeling just a little anxious now in case the three animals in front of them were of hostile intent
translation.tok: ni la ona tu li awen tawa li pilin lili pi ken ike ni soweli lon sinpin ona li utala

translation.en: and piglet wished very much that his grandfather t w were there instead of elsewhere
translation.tok: soweli lili li wile mute e ni mama mama t w li lon ni li lon ijo ante ala

translation.en: and pooh thought how nice it would be if they met christopher robin suddenly but quite accidentally and only because he liked christopher robin so much
translation.tok: soweli pu li toki insa e ni ona li kama lon poka pi jan kitopa jopin lon tenpo lili tan ken pi lili ale tan ni taso tawa ona la jan kitopa jopin li pona mute

translation.en: and then all of a sudden winniethepooh stopped again and licked the tip of his nose in a cooling manner for he was feeling more hot and anxious than ever in his life before
translation.tok: ni la tenpo lili la soweli wini pu li pini tawa lon tenpo sin li pana e lete li uta e nena pi sinpin lawa kepeken palisa uta tan ni ona li pilin seli en akesi pi mute pa wan

translation.en: there were four animals in front of them
translation.tok: soweli tu tu li lon sinpin ona tu

translation.en: do you see piglet
translation.tok: sina lukin e ni anu seme

translation.en: look at their tracks
translation.tok: o lukin e sitelen noka ona

translation.en: three as it were woozles and one as it was wizzle
translation.tok: soweli mute pi kiwen uta wawa en soweli lili pi kiwen uta wawa

translation.en: another woozle has joined them
translation.tok: soweli pi kiwen uta wawa li kama lon poka ona

translation.en: and so it seemed to be
translation.tok: tawa jan la ni li lon

translation.en: there were the tracks
translation.tok: sitelen noka li lon

translation.en: crossing over each other here getting muddled up with each other there
translation.tok: ona li kama lon poka ante lon ni wan li kama wan nasa lon ni ante

translation.en: but quite plainly every now and then the tracks of four sets of paws
translation.tok: taso jan li ken lukin pona e ni lon tenpo pi mute wan sitelen pi noka tu tu tu li lon

translation.en: i think said piglet when he had licked the tip of his nose too and found that it brought very little comfort i think that i have just remembered something
translation.tok: tawa mi la  li toki pi soweli lili lon tenpo ni ona sin li uta e nena pi sinpin lawa taso tawa ona la ni li pana e pilin pi pona lili  tawa mi la mi kama sin awen sona e ijo

translation.en: i have just remembered something that i forgot to do yesterday and shan’t be able to do tomorrow
translation.tok: mi kama sin awen sona e ijo mi pini sona e ona lon tenpo suno pini mi ken ala pali e ona lon tenpo suno kama

translation.en: so i suppose i really ought to go back
translation.tok: tan ni la mi wile tawa monsi

translation.en: and do it now
translation.tok: mi wile pali e ona lon tenpo ni

translation.en: we’ll do it this afternoon
translation.tok: mi tu li pali e ona lon pini pi tenpo suno ni

translation.en: and i’ll come with you said pooh
translation.tok: mi tawa lon poka sina li toki pi soweli pu

translation.en: it isn’t the sort of thing you can do in the afternoon said piglet quickly
translation.tok: jan li ken ala pali e ona ni lon pini pi tenpo suno li toki pi soweli lili lon tenpo lili

translation.en: it’s a very particular morning thing
translation.tok: ona li ijo wan pi kama pi tenpo suno

translation.en: that has to be done in the morning
translation.tok: jan li wile pali e ona lon kama pi tenpo suno

translation.en: and if possible between the hours of
translation.tok: jan li ken la ona o pali e ona lon

translation.en: what would you say the time was
translation.tok: tawa sina la wan seme pi tenpo suno li lon

translation.en: about twelve said winniethepooh looking at the sun
translation.tok: poka pi insa pi tenpo suno li lon li toki pi soweli wini pu ona li lukin e suno

translation.en: between as i was saying the hours of twelve and twelve five
translation.tok: lon  ni li toki mi  insa pi tenpo suno

translation.en: so really dear old pooh if you’ll excuse mewhat’s that
translation.tok: tan ni la ni la jan pona pu o sina wile weka e ike mi la  seme li lon

translation.en: pooh looked up at the sky and then as he heard the whistle again he looked up into the branches of a big oaktree and then he saw a friend of his
translation.tok: soweli pu li lukin e sewi li kute e kalama kon uta lon tenpo sin la ona li lukin e sewi e palisa pi kasi suli li kama lukin e jan pona ona

translation.en: it’s christopher robin he said
translation.tok: ni li jan kitopa jopin li toki ona

translation.en: ah then you’ll be all right said piglet
translation.tok: a ni la sina pona li toki pi soweli lili

translation.en: you’ll be quite safe with him
translation.tok: sina pona lon poka ona

translation.en: goodbye
translation.tok: mi tawa

translation.en: and he trotted off home as quickly as he could very glad to be out of all danger again
translation.tok: ona li tawa weka tawa tomo li pilin pona tan ni ona li pilin pi pona mute tan ni oni li lon weka pi ken pi ike kama

translation.en: christopher robin came slowly down his tree
translation.tok: jan kitopa jopin li kama anpa tan kasi suli ona

translation.en: silly old bear he said
translation.tok: soweli nasa pi luka wawa o li toki ona

translation.en: what were you doing
translation.tok: sina pali e seme

translation.en: first you went round the spinney twice by yourself
translation.tok: tenpo pa wan la sina tawa lon poka sike pi mute pi kasi suli moli

translation.en: and then piglet ran after you
translation.tok: pini ni la soweli lili li tawa wawa tawa monsi sina

translation.en: and you went round again together
translation.tok: sina tu li tawa lon poka sike lon tenpo sin lon poka kulupu

translation.en: and then you were just going round a fourth time
translation.tok: sin la sina tu li tawa lon poka sike lon tenpo pa tu tu

translation.en: wait a moment said winniethepooh holding up his paw
translation.tok: o awen lili li toki pi soweli wini pu ona li sewi e luka

translation.en: he sat down and thought in the most thoughtful way he could think
translation.tok: ona li kama anpa lon supa li toki insa pi wawa mute

translation.en: then he fitted his paw into one of the tracks…
translation.tok: pini ni la ona li lon sitelen luka e luka

translation.en: and then he scratched his nose twice and stood up
translation.tok: pini ni la ona li luka kiwen e nena pi sinpin lawa lon tenpo tu li kama sinpin

translation.en: yes said winniethepooh
translation.tok: lon li toki pi soweli wini pu

translation.en: i see now said winniethepooh
translation.tok: mi sona lon tenpo ni li toki pi soweli wini pu

translation.en: i have been foolish and deluded said he
translation.tok: mi nasa li toki ona

translation.en: and i am a bear of no brain at all
translation.tok: mi soweli pi luka wawa pi lawa pi ala ale

translation.en: you’re the best bear in all the world said christopher robin soothingly
translation.tok: sina soweli pi luka wawa pi pona pa wan li toki suwi pi jan kitopa jopin

translation.en: am i said pooh hopefully
translation.tok: mi ni anu seme li toki pi soweli pu ona li pilin pi ken pi pona kama

translation.en: and then he brightened up suddenly
translation.tok: ni la ona li kama sin pilin pona lon tenpo lili

translation.en: anyhow he said
translation.tok: mu li toki ona

translation.en: it is nearly luncheon time
translation.tok: tenpo moku li kama

translation.en: so he went home for it
translation.tok: ni la ona li tawa tomo tawa moku
